channel.title: How to make safe zones

item.title: How to make safe zones
item.dc:creator: @allpker allpker
item.description:
@allpker wrote:

so to add a new line i would put this above it im guessing: public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if (Type == 1) {
if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) {
return true;
}
but instead i make the coordinates of edgeville and put false or can any1 just send me wat i put and where
exactly plz?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make safe zones
item.dc:creator: @allpker allpker
item.description:
@allpker wrote:

i got a question this is wat i search for in client.java search “public boolean isinwilderness” so this is wat i see: public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if (Type == 1) {
if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) {
return true;

So yes above is wat i see so how do i make safe zones? every body tells me i have to search public boolean if anyone can help me make safe zones it would be great help!

Read full topic
